sentences.en: Breakfast consisted of porridge served with butter.
sentences.cn: 早餐是麦片粥配佐餐黄油。

sentences.en: Can't you even carry a bowl of porridge without dropping it?
sentences.cn: 端惯了的东西也会跌翻 么 ?

sentences.en: Don't scald your lips in another man's porridge.
sentences.cn: 不要在别人的热粥上烫伤你的嘴唇.

sentences.en: For breakfast I have porridge made with water, to which I add raisins.
sentences.cn: 早餐我喝用水煮的麦片粥，还往里加葡萄干。

sentences.en: He's doing porridge again, this time for armed robbery.
sentences.cn: 他又坐牢了, 这次是因为持械抢劫.

sentences.en: I don't care about what you think; save your breath to cool your porridge!
sentences.cn: 我不在乎你怎么想, 你省点力气,别白费口舌了!

sentences.en: I'll pass on the fried potato crisp, but take the porridge.
sentences.cn: 炸土豆片我不吃了，粥还是要喝的。

sentences.en: Save your breath to cool your porridge.
She was feeding the baby with porridge.
The dinner is simple--wheat porridge and dried vegetables.
sentences.cn: 晚餐很简单，麦片和干菜。

sentences.en: The prisoners subsisted on one mug of the worst quality porridge three times a day.
sentences.cn: 犯人们每日三餐靠一碗稀粥度日。

sentences.en: Their room was bare of furniture and they lived off porridge.
sentences.cn: 他们家徒四壁，靠喝粥度日。

sentences.en: They lived frugally off a diet of porridge and lentils.
sentences.cn: 他们生活节俭,只吃燕麦粥和小扁豆.

sentences.en: We go for a run together in the morning then have porridge for breakfast.
sentences.cn: 早上起来我们会一起跑步，早餐一起吃麦片粥。

trans.tran_en: oats  that are cooked with milk or water and served hot for breakfast
